==Profile==
Tepexpan is a member of the [[Masters of the Night-Wind]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Quest)}}</ref> He took part in the [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] in {{Quest|Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn}} alongside [[Tamuin]].

==Trivia==
*{{w|Tepexpan}} is the largest town in the {{w|Acolman}} municipality of the {{w|State of Mexico}} in {{w|Mexico}}, it is famed for the discovery of the early Mesoamerican skeleton the {{w|Tepexpan man}}.
